title: FS: PSA Hindu Pastorius and Wilhelm
author: inceptus

posts.post_title: FS: PSA Hindu Pastorius and Wilhelm
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are two tough-to-find PSA-graded Hindus-- prices include shipping via Priority Mail:

Pastorius, PSA 3 (with a PWCC Above Average sticker, if that floats your boat): $1,400
Wilhelm (Hands at Chest), PSA 2: $1,200

Can't seem to upload the photos here-- please see my Flickr album: [url]https://www.flickr.com/gp/197584744@N04/T6BAsND4o9[/url]
